entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 01:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
